Package org.apache.heron.api.windowing.triggers

Class WatermarkTimeTriggerPolicy<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.api.windowing.triggers.AbstractBaseTriggerPolicy<T,​java.lang.Long>
      • org.apache.heron.api.windowing.triggers.WatermarkTimeTriggerPolicy<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TriggerPolicy<T,​java.lang.Long>
    public class WatermarkTimeTriggerPolicy<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends AbstractBaseTriggerPolicy<T,​java.lang.Long>
    Handles watermark events and triggers TriggerHandler.onTrigger() for each window interval that has events to be processed up to the watermark ts.

    • Field Summary
